entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with a few flurries after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to 11 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
